Testing Random Access Files
===========================

Test 1: FIELD, LSET, PUT, GET
FIELD/LSET/PUT/GET: PASS

Test 2: RSET (right-justify)
LSET/RSET alignment: PASS

Test 3: Multiple records
Record 2 retrieval: PASS
Record 1 retrieval: PASS
Record 3 retrieval: PASS

Test 4: Numeric data in fields
Numeric field conversion: PASS

Random access file tests complete!
